subject:
svn commit: samba r22288 - in
	branches/SAMBA_4_0/source/script/tests: .
body:
Author: abartlet
Date: 2007-04-17 01:06:10 +0000 (Tue, 17 Apr 2007)
New Revision: 22288

WebSVN: http://websvn.samba.org/cgi-bin/viewcvs.cgi?view=rev&root=samba&rev=22288

Log:
Somehow, Jelmer lost a few capital letters.  I'll send him a new batch.

Andrew Bartlett

Modified:
   branches/SAMBA_4_0/source/script/tests/Samba4.pm


Changeset:
Modified: branches/SAMBA_4_0/source/script/tests/Samba4.pm
===================================================================
--- branches/SAMBA_4_0/source/script/tests/Samba4.pm	2007-04-17 00:53:07 UTC (rev 22287)
+++ branches/SAMBA_4_0/source/script/tests/Samba4.pm	2007-04-17 01:06:10 UTC (rev 22288)
@@ -181,15 +181,15 @@
 	print CONF "
 [General]
 SuiteSpotUserID = $root
-fullMachineName=   localhost
+FullMachineName=   localhost
 ServerRoot=   $ldapdir
 
 [slapd]
 ldapifilepath=$ldapdir/ldapi
 Suffix= $basedn
-rootDN= cn=Manager,$basedn
-rootDNPwd= $password
-serverIdentifier= samba4
+RootDN= cn=Manager,$basedn
+RootDNPwd= $password
+ServerIdentifier= samba4
 InstallLdifFile=$fedora_ds_initial_ldif
 
 inst_dir= $fedora_ds_dir
